params.errorCode: The error code returned by the comptroller

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

returns.hasDeviation: True if deviation exceeds configured threshold

params.corePoolComptroller_: Address of the core pool comptroller

handleDeviation(address).custom:error: UnauthorizedKeeper is thrown when caller is not a trusted keeperMarketNotConfigured is thrown when market's underlying token has no deviation configTokenMonitoringDisabled is thrown when monitoring is disabled for the tokenComptrollerError is thrown when comptroller operation fails
handleDeviation(address).custom:event: Emits BorrowPaused when borrow is paused due to high sentinel priceEmits BorrowUnpaused when borrow is unpaused after deviation resolvedEmits SupplyPaused when supply is paused due to low sentinel priceEmits SupplyUnpaused when supply is unpaused after deviation resolvedEmits CollateralFactorUpdated when collateral factor is modified

params.accessControlManager_: Address of the access control manager

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

setTokenConfig(address,(uint8,bool)).custom:error: ZeroAddress is thrown when token address is zeroZeroDeviation is thrown when deviation is set to zeroExceedsMaxDeviation is thrown when deviation exceeds MAX_DEVIATION

params.config: Deviation configuration containing threshold and enabled status

setTokenMonitoringEnabled(address,bool).custom:error: ZeroAddress is thrown when token address is zeroMarketNotConfigured is thrown when token has no deviation config

params.enabled: Whether to enable or disable monitoring

setTrustedKeeper(address,bool).custom:error: ZeroAddress is thrown when keeper address is zero

params.isTrusted: Whether the keeper should be trusted

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

ExceedsMaxDeviation().notice: Thrown when deviation exceeds maximum allowed

MarketNotConfigured().notice: Thrown when market is not configured for monitoring

TokenMonitoringDisabled().notice: Thrown when token monitoring is disabled

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

UnauthorizedKeeper().notice: Thrown when caller is not an authorized keeper

ZeroAddress().notice: Thrown when a zero address is provided

ZeroDeviation().notice: Thrown when deviation is set to zero

BorrowPaused(address).notice: Emitted when borrow is paused for a market

BorrowUnpaused(address).notice: Emitted when borrow is unpaused for a market

CollateralFactorUpdated(address,uint256,.notice: Emitted when collateral factor is updated for isolated pool

CollateralFactorUpdated(address,uint96,u.notice: Emitted when collateral factor is updated for core pool

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

SupplyPaused(address).notice: Emitted when supply is paused for a market

SupplyUnpaused(address).notice: Emitted when supply is unpaused for a market

TokenConfigUpdated(address,(uint8,bool)).notice: Emitted when a token's deviation configuration is updated

TokenMonitoringStatusChanged(address,boo.notice: Emitted when a token's monitoring status is changed

TrustedKeeperUpdated(address,bool).notice: Emitted when a keeper's trusted status is updated

CORE_POOL_COMPTROLLER().notice: Address of the Core Pool Comptroller

MAX_DEVIATION().notice: Maximum allowed price deviation in percentage (e.g., 10 = 10%)

RESILIENT_ORACLE().notice: Resilient Oracle for getting reference prices

SENTINEL_ORACLE().notice: Sentinel Oracle for getting DEX prices

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

checkPriceDeviation(address).notice: Check if there is a price deviation between resilient oracle and sentinel oracle for a market

handleDeviation(address).notice: Handle price deviation for a market by pausing or adjusting collateral factor

marketStates(address).notice: Mapping to track market state changes made by this contract

setTokenConfig(address,(uint8,bool)).notice: Set deviation configuration for a token

setTokenMonitoringEnabled(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable deviation monitoring for a token

setTrustedKeeper(address,bool).notice: Set trusted status for a keeper

tokenConfigs(address).notice: Mapping of token addresses to their DEX configuration

userdoc.notice: Sentinel that compares ResilientOracle and SentinelOracle prices (via keeper) and pauses         specific actions (borrow, mint, collateral factor) per market when         large deviations are detected.
